item.title: McAfee launches scam detector to stop scams before they strike
item.description: Scams are everywhere. McAfee’s new scam detector spots and stops scams across text, email, and video to keep you from being fooled.

item.title: Onscreen’s TV-based AI companion provides help for elder caregivers
item.description: After starting out with a TV-based product, Onscreen is bringing its Joy AI companion app for seniors to Android tablets and iPads.

item.title: Agentic AI can help you to get a new software engineering job in 2025
item.description: Thanks to a widening skills shortage, software engineers don’t generally have to look too far for a new role on better money.

item.title: Global VC investments rose 5.4% to $368.5B in 2024, but deals fell 17% | NVCA/Pitchbook
item.description: Global venture capital investments rose to $368.5 billion in 2024, up 5.4% from $349.4 billion a year earlier, the NVCA/Pitchbook said.

item.title: Nvidia’s AI agent play is here with new models, orchestration blueprints
item.description: Nvidia enters the AI agent space with a family of language models for agentic instruction and orchestrarion frameworks it calls Blueprints.
